Name: Moongeist Beam
Effect: Single Target. Lethal. Unique. If anything on the Foe's side would prevent this move from dealing damage (eg. Pok√©mon Type, Abilities, Shield Moves, Weather, or Force Fields), ignore it. This Move cannot be Clashed.
Description: A cold reflection of the moon shines upon the target. It doesn't hurt physically, but those who stare directly into the light simply collapse.
